        kind: OpenTag(

        ),
        span: (

        ),

        kind: Function,
        span: (

        kind: Identifier(
            "foo",
        ),
        span: (
            3,
            10,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: LeftParen,
        span: (
            3,
            13,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Comment(
            "/* $bar */",
        ),
        span: (
            3,
            14,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: RightParen,
        span: (
            3,
            24,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: LeftBrace,
        span: (
            3,
            26,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: RightBrace,

            3,

        ),
